Type Design

I design fonts! None of these are "officially" available to purchase, but if you're interested in licensing them anyway, shoot me an email: mel@nezu.world

editable samples

tm-mega

A sturdy sans serif with superelliptical curves and a Frutigerian flair. Mega supports Latin Plus (incl. Pinyin & Vietnamese), extended Cyrillic, and polytonic Greek. 9000+ kerning pairs.

56 px

tm-pico

A cute sans-serif with a crude geometric feel and minimal optical corrections. Pico supports Latin Plus (incl. Pinyin & Vietnamese) and basic Cyrillic — for now.

pico-A

Non-rounded variant.

56 px

pico-B

Rounded variant.

56 px

tm-spec

My first typeface, formerly known as "sb-spec" and "sb-studio".

56 px
